State.Author: Baerthe - Cryptdick - SOTS Team

Adds over 65+ new Locations in and below the glowing sea. More Loot! More Fun! More Thrills!

State.Author: Commonwealth Story Expansion Project
State.Description: Loaded Bases is a Buddy Cop mod that becomes a Noir where you join DC security. You and a partner investigate several leads throughout the wasteland trying to track down the chem trade. Eventually, you find out there's something more going on with refurbished Synths,  within the gangs of the commonwealth.
